headline: Nucor (NUE): Assessing Valuation After Wells Fargo Upgrade and Bold Growth Plans for Data Center Steel Demand
summary: Wells Fargo recently upgraded Nucor (NUE), citing the company’s strong positioning in the booming US steel market. With its CapEx guidance raised to $3.3 billion, Nucor is eyeing growth as demand rises for specialized steel in data centers. See our latest analysis for Nucor. After a year marked by a sector-wide demand surge and headline-grabbing investments in data center steel, Nucor’s share price momentum has been building, with a 39% return year-to-date and the stock closing at $159.13...

headline: Nucor (NUE) Is Up 7.1% After Raising CapEx Guidance on Surging Data Center Steel Demand
summary: Wells Fargo recently upgraded Nucor and the company raised its capital expenditure guidance to US$3.3 billion, highlighting accelerated project spending supported by US steel market expectations. Nucor now supplies more than 95% of all steel used in data centers, tapping into specialized, higher-margin products amid rapid AI sector growth. We'll explore how Nucor's expanded focus on AI-driven data center steel demand may influence its broader investment case going forward. Rare earth metals...
